content: The word of the LORD that came to Micah of Moresheth in the days of Kings Jotham, Ahaz, and Hezekiah of Judah, which he saw concerning Samaria and Jerusalem.
Hear, you peoples, all of you;
and let the Lord  be a witness against you,
For lo, the  is coming out of his place,
Then the mountains will melt under him
All this is for the transgression of Jacob
What is the transgression of Jacob?
And what is the high place of Judah?
Therefore I will make Samaria a heap in the open country,
I will pour down her stones into the valley,
All her images shall be beaten to pieces,
for as the wages of a prostitute she gathered them,
The Doom of the Cities of Judah
For this I will lament and wail;
I will make lamentation like the jackals,
it has reached to the gate of my people,
